def buildArray(target, n):
    result = []
    counter = 1
    k = 1
    for i in range(len(target)):
        while k < target[i]:
            result.append('Push')
            result.append('Pop')
            counter += 2
            k += 1
        result.append('Push')
        counter += 1
        k += 1
    return (result, counter)
